benchmark_details.name: CTO (Clinical Trial Outcome)
benchmark_details.overview: The CTO benchmark provides a large-scale repository integrating approximately 125,000 drug and biologics trials, including LLM interpretations, phase progression tracking, sentiment analysis from news sources, and other trial-related metrics, aimed at improving the quality and reliability of clinical trial outcome labels.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To democratize clinical trial outcome prediction and improve predictive modeling in drug development.

data.source: CTTI (Clinical Trial Transformation Initiative) database and various online news sources.
data.annotation: Manually annotated dataset of clinical trials from 2020 to 2024.

methodology.calculation: The F1 score is calculated based on the agreement of automated labels with human-annotated labels.
methodology.interpretation: An F1 score close to 1 indicates high agreement with expert annotations.
methodology.baseline_results: Achieved an F1 score of 94 for Phase 3 trials and 91 across all phases.
methodology.validation: Peer-reviewed and validated against existing datasets.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: We use publicly available data, minimizing the risk of identification.
